candidates.name: Glenn Livingstone
candidates.why_elect: I have been with the east of Christchurch since the earthquakes. My track record includes the promotion of an Insurance Tribunal, which has now been brought into law.
candidates.why_stand: My entire working life has been and is vocational—as a Presbyterian Minister and now as a City Councillor. Neither have been jobs for me. I am here to serve the community.

candidates.name: Phil Mauger
candidates.why_elect: I can bring business and common sense to the council. I have run a successful family business in Civil Construction in Christchurch for decades. With my background I know exactly what needs to be done to fix the state of the roads and land in the East.
candidates.why_stand: I have been thinking of standing for council for 12 years. I have talked about it long enough and it is time for action. I have lived and worked in this ward for 55 years and know it like the back of my hand.
